探索胆汁淤积与抑郁症之间的联系宣布了Acta Materia Medica Journal的新出版物。胆固性肝病患者的抑郁样行为的患病率明显更高，从而显着降低了生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/exploring-the-link-between-cholestasis-and-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/20250223/exploring-the-link-betweew-cholestasis-and-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6be7f44c-d854-4bf4-9224-1de3029bc20e Sun, 23 Feb 2025 23:12:46 -0500 Exploring the link between cholestasis and depression
毒液无处不在：研究检查隐藏的毒素递送系统跨越生命形式忘记蛇和蜘蛛 - 一项新的评论详细介绍了有毒植物，真菌甚至细菌，证明自然最致命的秘密武器比我们想象的要广泛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/venom-is-everywhere-study-scamines-hidded-toxin-delivery-systemss-across-life-life-life-forms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/venom-is-everywhere-study-sendy-examines-hidden-toxin-delivery-systemss-across-life-life-life-forms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60B2D3B2-0A4D-4C48-8E76-4BB521D783BF Sun, 23 Feb 2025 23:09:00 -0500 Venom is everywhere: Study examines hidden toxin delivery systems across life forms
未来食品油的选择可以决定全球森林的命运研究人员表明，满足2050年的植物油需求可能会促进1.48亿公顷的森林砍伐和1525吨CO2排放，从而质疑棕榈油替代品的可持续性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/future-future-food-oil-choices-could-determine-the-fate-the-fate-of-global-forests.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/future-future-future-food-oil-choices-could-determine-the-fate-the-fate-fate-forests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09254CAC-017E-4AAD-4AAD-A8A0-60EF67C36B12 Sun, 23 Feb 2025 22:23:00 -0500 Future food oil choices could determine the fate of global forests
研究发现，大多数植物性餐厅的餐食都是不健康的许多素食主义者和素食餐厅的餐点都包含不健康的食材，例如精制谷物，饱和脂肪和炸食品，而Omni餐厅提供的健康选择少于蔬菜餐馆。研究人员敦促提高营养透明度，以帮助消费者做出明智的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/Most-plant-based-restaurant-meals-are-unhealthy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/Most-plant-based-restaurant-meals-are-unhealthy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26717710-fead-496f-496f-aae5-6c71f94ba84e Sun, 23 Feb 2025 21:38:00 -0500 Most plant-based restaurant meals are unhealthy, study finds
微绿色外观成熟蔬菜：研究发现较高的抗氧化剂和生物活性化合物研究人员分析了六个微生物，揭示了它们的营养谱，高抗氧化剂含量以及对抗微量营养素缺陷的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/microgreens-undshine-mature-mature-vegetables-sendy-pudy-finds-higher-antioxidants-andioxidants-and-bioacioactive-compounds.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/microgreens-undshine-mathine-mature-wegetables-study-finds-higher-antioxidants-andioxidants-and-bioactive and-bioactive-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3d421d5-7dad-43Ae-43Ae-81BB-7565cc7695ec Sun, 23 Feb 2025 21:19:00 -0500 Microgreens outshine mature vegetables: Study finds higher antioxidants and bioactive compounds
红色人参可以预防糖尿病吗？新研究发现了其潜力红色人参提取物粉末在12周内显着改善了糖尿病前成年人的血糖控制，而不会产生不利影响。研究结果表明，尽管需要更大的研究，但它在预防糖尿病中的潜在作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/can-red-ginseng-prevent-daibetes-new-research-unsearch-uncovers-istent-potential.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/can-red-ginseng-prevent-diabetes-new-research-usearch-uncovers-uncovers-its-potential.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58DFBFAF-813D-4271-BBB5-48EB10E6C470 Sun, 23 Feb 2025 20:53:00 -0500 Can red ginseng prevent diabetes? New research uncovers its potential

您的家中充满了霉菌，但是日托充满了酵母菌，这就是为什么研究人员发现，日托具有较高的酵母菌，而私人房屋则包含更多产生孢子的模具，乘员密度和通风在真菌分布中起着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/your-home-is-is-is-s-full-of-mold-but-daycares-are-are-teeming-with-yeaste28094 heree280999s-why.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/your-home-is-is-is-s---of-mold-but-daycares-are-are-teeming-with-yeaste28094 heree280999s-why.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8217bd1-0704-4c7a-b3ed-c2b87c806cf4 Sun, 23 Feb 2025 19:55:00 -0500 Your home is full of mold, but daycares are teeming with yeast—here’s why
研究表明，衰老不仅在基因中 - 您的环境起着更大的作用。研究探讨了遗传学和环境因素对衰老和过早死亡的相对贡献。它强调了杂物组（悠久的环境暴露）如何形状疾病的风险，具有社会经济状况，吸烟和生活方式选择，成为关键的衰老决定因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/aging-isning-isne28099t-just-just-in-your-genese28094 your-envirans-aplays-a-a-bigger-a-bigger-a-bigger-a-bigger-lole-lole-lole-stud-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250223/aging-isning-isne28099t-just-just-in-your-genese28094 your-envirans-aplays-a-bigger-a-bigger-a-bigger-lole-lole-lole-study-study-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AF0AF98F-D519-485A-AC8C-E6B914C06573 Sun, 23 Feb 2025 19:21:00 -0500 Aging isn’t just in your genes—your environment plays a bigger role, study shows
